title: Is there any app that does 'live' OCR on iPhone OS or Android? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. There are lots of OCR applications on google play.  I have used Docs Matter - document mobile scanner and BizCards Matter - Business Card Reader. They can scan the documents or business cards, then provide result in real-time for you.  The average time for recognition of a document less than 6 seconds. The recognition accuracy can reach 99%. It is really good. If you are interested in them, you can search them on google play.
FotoNote: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/fotonote/id403100177(Disclaimer: This app uses OCR technology with some ties to my company)
